exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros n m H. destruct m as [|m]. - left. exists 0. reflexivity. - right. pose proof (euclide _ _ H) as [q [r [H1 H2]]]. exists (quotient_euclide _ _ H). exists (remainder_euclide _ _ H). exists q. exists (power r m). repeat split; try auto. + apply nat_factor_prime. * apply power_gt_0. * apply power_lt. ++ apply lt_trans with r; auto. ++ apply euclide. -- apply H. -- apply H1. + apply is_gcd. * apply H1. * intros d [H3 H4]. apply divides_pow in H3. destruct H3 as [k H3]. subst n. apply mult_cancel_r in H2. rewrite <- H2 in H4. apply H4. apply H.
